contact.title: Contact details
contact.intro: Welcome to United Properties, we are glad to see you! Let’s get started by letting us know a little bit about you
contact.privacy_text: We know you care about how your personal information is used and shared, so we take your privacy seriously

invesmentplans.title: Investment plans
invesmentplans.intro: Let us know about your investment plans. This will help us get you to the right expert who will help you further

invesmentpreferences.title: Investment preferences
invesmentpreferences.intro: This will help us figure out what your investment options are so that we can show you only possibly intresting for you deals

1.text: We care about your time, that's why we created a 3-stage onboarding that will not take more than 5 minutes to complete

2.text: Save from thousands to millions on your deal. Secure the best possible. And get independent, unbiased advice for free

3.text: United Properties is about fast & easy searching, buying, selling and investing ever — online, with an expert by our side
